statements: SELECT * FROM user_settings;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM user_settings WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_settings WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, timezone FROM user_settings ORDER BY timezone;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, language, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE dark_mode = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, language, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE language IN ('English', 'Spanish');
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM user_settings WHERE timezone = 'UTC' AND dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM user_settings;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM user_settings ORDER BY dark_mode DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT timezone FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification, dark_mode FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_settings WHERE timezone = 'GMT+3' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone, notification FROM user_settings JOIN preferences ON user_settings.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE dark_mode = true;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE language IN ('English', 'Spanish', 'French') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_settings LEFT JOIN preferences ON user_settings.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE notification = false;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM settings WHERE theme = 'light';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE dark_mode_enabled = true;
SELECT user_id, username, email, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT users.username, settings.theme FROM users JOIN settings ON users.user_id = settings.user_id;
SELECT users.username, preferences.dark_mode_enabled FROM users LEFT JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM UserSettings;
SELECT user_id, timezone FROM UserSettings WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY sound_volume DESC;
SELECT theme_name, primary_color FROM ThemeOptions WHERE primary_color = 'blue';
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, push_notifications, sms_notifications FROM NotificationSettings WHERE push_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, timezone FROM UserSettings;
SELECT user_id, theme, notifications, sound_volume FROM UserPreferences WHERE notifications = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, push_notifications, sms_notifications FROM NotificationSettings WHERE push_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT preference_id, user_id, theme, sound_volume FROM UserPreferences WHERE sound_volume > 50;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, language, notifications FROM UserSettings JOIN UserPreferences ON UserSettings.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users_settings;
SELECT id, username FROM users_settings ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT email FROM users_settings WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users_settings WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users_settings WHERE theme = 'light' OR theme = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM users_settings WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE language = 'spanish' ORDER BY timezone DESC;
SELECT id, email_notifications FROM notifications WHERE push_notifications = false LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM account_settings WHERE privacy_level = 'private' AND two_factor_auth = true;
SELECT user_id, setting_key, setting_value FROM custom_settings WHERE setting_key LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY setting_key ASC;
